post_description:
fully equipped to accommodate visitors.
Children under 6 years old and seniors can enter for free
Free guided tours for visitors in Arabic and English
Citadel of Qaitbay, located in Alexandria, Egypt, is a prominent historical fortress built in the 15th century by Sultan Al-Ashraf Sayf al-Din Qaitbay.
address_title: The Citadel is situated at the western end of the Alexandria Corniche, on the Pharos Island.
